about_the_game:
Play as the Mobs who guard the entrance of the Dungeon of Baktis, who, upon seeing the heroes coming, decide that it is a far better idea to defeat the heroes after looting the dungeon themselves. Defeat your former allies stealing the magical items they guard, all while running away from the inevitable fight with the valiant yet dumb heroes.


Be joined by up to 3 other people, friends and enemies alike, local or online, to conquer the dungeon and defeat enemies (and yourselves) for the loot!


Knockout the loyal mobs in a mad dash throughout the dungeon to steal loot from chests, unlocking unique items that change how you play the game.


Find the secret items in the dungeon by feeding the mimic enough gold in his little market between floors!


Grab as much loot as possible, as the heroes are coming! When they arrive, you’ll enter combat to fend them off! If you are defeated, they’ll steal your loot, and you’ll find yourself mysteriously at the entrance once more…
detailed_description:
Play as the Mobs who guard the entrance of the Dungeon of Baktis, who, upon seeing the heroes coming, decide that it is a far better idea to defeat the heroes after looting the dungeon themselves. Defeat your former allies stealing the magical items they guard, all while running away from the inevitable fight with the valiant yet dumb heroes.


Be joined by up to 3 other people, friends and enemies alike, local or online, to conquer the dungeon and defeat enemies (and yourselves) for the loot!


Knockout the loyal mobs in a mad dash throughout the dungeon to steal loot from chests, unlocking unique items that change how you play the game.


Find the secret items in the dungeon by feeding the mimic enough gold in his little market between floors!


Grab as much loot as possible, as the heroes are coming! When they arrive, you’ll enter combat to fend them off! If you are defeated, they’ll steal your loot, and you’ll find yourself mysteriously at the entrance once more…

name: Mobbers Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Can you read this on your PC?
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Not on fire (Unless you're fast enough)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz+ (or better)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 2GB-DDR5
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes but better
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Not on fire (How?)

short_description: Mobbers is a roguelike dungeon shooter with randomised items, rooms, themes and enemies. Choose to play as the Goblin, Skeleton, Slime or Kobold and turn against the other mobs in the dungeon to escape, gear up and then fight against the approaching heroes trying to loot your home.
